Name: RSI Constellation Taurus Wikelo War Special
Description:
Manufacturer: RSI
Focus: Medium Freight

Paired down to fully focus on hauling, the Taurus provides the most cargo space of any ship in RSI’s Constellation line-up. What it loses in versatility it more than makes up for in potential profits thanks to its tractor beams, a cargo release system for quick unloading, and a security hold reinforced with tech plating.

Wikelo here. Made useful modifications to make ship much more fighter like. Very impressive.
